website_summaries.verdict: Many runners were appreciative of the Asics Endurant and its features. For them, it was good at what it had in store for them. Mostly, the design, the price and the majority of its components favored well to them. It’s a road shoe that worked well, according to neutral runners. But there were complaints about its cheap-looking parts, it’s apparently flimsy cushioning system and its questionable durability.
pros: The Asics Endurant fit perfectly around the feet of many runners
The mesh material of the upper unit gained praise for being breathable
Several consumers felt that the mid-sole unit was soft and agreeable for their feet
The general durability of the shoe was lauded by those who have tried it
Purchasers liked the visual aesthetic of this product
Some users were able to use it for casual purposes and they wrote that it remained efficient
A good number of consumers described this shoe as comfortable
There were testers who thought that it had a suitably lightweight disposition
Many runners thought that it was affordable
cons: The upper unit tore apart after only a month of use, reported a consumer
A user complained that the materials featured in this shoe looked cheap and flimsy
The cushioning system wasn’t as responsive or comfortable as several testers expected

customer_reviews.title: These are ones I will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I have had these shoes for several weeks now. They have held up well and do not get easily torn like my other ASICS. I have gotten lots of scuff marks near the front of the shoe. But there are no torn areas on them. The souls are not orange out after 50 miles of walking on them. That is a huge plus for me. Although the inserts that came with the shoes are not the greatest to me, I have bought my own inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: I looked for shoes with better support and the first brand I turned to was ...
customer_reviews.text: I've worn ASICs for running shoes for more then 10 years. However, once I moved to the middle east I couldn't wear causal shoes anymore. I think my arches feel or something. My feet became swollen and it was difficult to even walk far for about two weeks. So, I looked for shoes with better support and the first brand I turned to was ASICS. I can definitely say that it's really contributed to my overall physical health. My feet still hurt occasionally but it's much better now. Also I want to add that these shoes are really airy so no sweaty feet :). Thanks for making a superior product that can last, provides support and can be worn casually.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They've had a lot of miles put on them and a bit of yard work too. The type of laces last longer and seem to be easier to clean than the standard flat laces. The color hasn't faded much and even the worn areas are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! So comfy and fit a wide foot like mine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected - helps if ASICS brand running shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected - helps if ASICS brand running shoes are the only I buy. Will definitely do business with this seller again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Bought them before at Burlington good Thing I came across these again on amazon since ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them before at Burlington good Thing I came across these again on amazon since they are the best working out and running shoes fit perfectly comfortable on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Flavia Langille

customer_reviews.title: I've always liked Asics, they fit true to their size chart
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Asics, they fit true to their size chart. Good support, and pretty light. Not so much mesh that stepping in a puddle soaks your foot, but still breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it’s very light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: The flat bottom and lack of arch support are noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: Just not what I expected. Been wearing Asics for years. This shoe is a little short of what the others have been.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are great for using as walking shoes when wearing black dressed ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for using as walking shoes when wearing black dressed pants. I've used them for about a year now, and they still hold up great over time.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyrocket13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light, appears very durable, no complaints to date, worn for 4 months, no issues
customer_reviews.author: Lubo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Wear it at the office where I'm on my feet 50% of the day as a physical therapist. Months in, handling without signs of wear & tear.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton04

customer_reviews.title: Don't like netting material.
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the netting material. It doesn't provide the same support as older versions do.
customer_reviews.author: Greensquirrel333

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comfy shoes not to flashy so you can pull off a casual look
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Love these ASICS running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These running shoes fit as expected, and are sturdy, comfortable, and attractive. They are good value for the money. I couldn't be more pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: DEIRDRE M.

customer_reviews.title: Asics Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These Asics shoes are close to perfect. They fit great and are very comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: MrG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Asics are my go to shoe. Always fit right and last months.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Swearingen

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they are a bit bigger if this is your first ASICS shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The non-ASICS reviewers here were right about their shoes running a little big. I switched from Nike's, for some context. I did order a half size smaller than usual and they're still a bit big, but not too much so. Other than that, they feel really light and they breathe really well, which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME SHOES!! I would not use as running shoe, but everyday casual walking shoe is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift, reliable size was what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: corey stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. But, I'm finding that asics runs about a half size too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: barbisrvnge

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great for work if you work on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was too narrow in the toe area. There wasn't much give.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise looks great and light weight great for running
customer_reviews.text: I brought the wrong size--my fault. Otherwise looks great and light weight great for running.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but lacks some arch support
customer_reviews.text: ASICS shoes always seem to fit my feet better than other shoes. This pair is light weight and comfortable, but it doesn't have the arch support that I have come to expect from this brand. Therefore, I'm a little disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JWK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super lite and comfortable. I walk a lot at work and these are really good
customer_reviews.author: William Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Good basic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit was right on and for the money a great value
customer_reviews.author: Gonzonator

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wear them at work, and they've held up fine so far. (6 months of heavy use, and very little wear).
customer_reviews.author: Tyger Lord

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of support
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight. Doesn't have a lot of support for any side to side movement
customer_reviews.author: Beatman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING WITH COMFORT TO MATCH.
customer_reviews.text: i ORDERED A HALF SIZE LARGER WHEN BUYING OTHER TNAN NB SO THEY FIT BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes I bought 2 pair there is nothing I don't like about these shoes
customer_reviews.author: James Kovitch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the shoe size was as expected, arrived in new condition
customer_reviews.author: jahus

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, on my feet all day and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: J. Cuz

customer_reviews.title: Walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: For the price not too bad. The only imperfection is the discoloration between the upper and the shoe itself. I would not hesitate to buy these shoes again for walking. As just indicated these are good shoes for walking!
customer_reviews.author: DuWayne

customer_reviews.title: A+ for ASICS
customer_reviews.text: I have tried them all and I will never buy another sport shoe than Asics. This particular pair are as comfortable as slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty well and very light. Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Always quality and fit great!
customer_reviews.text: I buy all my shoes from Asics. Including the wrestling ones for the gym. Always quality and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: HungryHowrey

customer_reviews.title: nice looking shoe but it does run large
customer_reviews.text: nice looking shoe but it does run large. Usually wear size 13 in athletic shoes and definitely have room in the shoe. Would be better to get half/full size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size up and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: too large.
customer_reviews.text: great shoe, but was to large for me to wear. I normally get 11.5 so after reading other peoples reviews on the shoes I ordered a pair of 11's and found them still to be to large for my feet. I haven't ordered another pair of 10.5 or 10's yet so I can't attest to the need for everyone that wants these shoes of downsizing a full size, but for me I will have to do that and possibly a little more.
customer_reviews.author: JTT

customer_reviews.title: Soft On Feet and Budget
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came as expected, the soles are very soft making the shoes VERY comfortable to walk or run in, the mesh seems durable and allows sufficeint airflow to keep the feet dry. Shoe fit about half a size bigger than expected - compared to the DC brand.
customer_reviews.author: dc4l727

customer_reviews.title: Fit's fine, cushioning of steps is fine
customer_reviews.text: I put a lot of miles on my shoes, for work, and these are ok. Fit's fine, cushioning of steps is fine. I'm not sure the tread will last the 6 months I usually wear my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the details.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt see the details until I got the shoes, they have a pattern on them that is not attractive. I jsut wanted plain black shoes. I returned them. They fit and all but that turned me off of these.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Have always liked Asics. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have always liked Asics. Good quality. Only negative feedback is that when these arrived they were slightly lighter black then I imagined. Almost a grayish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is your basic shoe. I walk a few times a week in them and wear them whenever I don't think I will be getting them muddy or might have to run in them. I would not recommend for running or high activity. That being said they have held up a few months of normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: cstp806

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I can never go wrong with Asics. They ALWAYS fit and feel perfect on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Birdman Bird

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, Deals with rain and snow well without coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic and have held up nicely to the daily abuse from a young teen. They must be extremely comfortable, because it is like pulling teeth to get him to take them off when he gets home.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie K

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, and the fit. I bought these to wear at work. (Computer Technician) but right above the big toe on one shoe the stitching is coming out after less than two weeks. There will soon be a hole. Compared to my last pair of Nike that lasted two years with minimal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe, however
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfortable shoe, however, it certainly runs half a size to a full size large.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow af.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I'll be wearing these on a regular bases. Just every once and a while since they do look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: N. Black

customer_reviews.title: Better than nike
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, I used to use Nike running shoes but I would still have issues with my calves, so I decided to try these instead and so far they work perfect. I have no pain at all and they're very comfortable. Also really nice for regular shoes to wear as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are super comfortable as I use them for light jogging. I was very impressed at how snug they fit and for the price I paid. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs comfortable running shoes while not trying to break the bank!!
customer_reviews.author: Lamont Siejack

customer_reviews.title: For people with wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet, i always order nikes or pumas. I ordered these on a whim and they were way too big. Im usually a 12 but these were way too big in the length and width.
customer_reviews.author: Colten

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality and cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Poor build quality and cheap materials. Not a good buy let down by these shoes. They won't last two months with me.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, but not terribly functional
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is attractive, and looks well-made. The width was fine, but the length was longer than other Asics I've tried in the same size. The biggest downside though is the nearly non-existent cushioning in the sole and rather structure-less fit. I couldn't recommend this shoe for anything other than casual wear. Even long walks might require more cushion and support than this shoe has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: mama reads

customer_reviews.title: make sure you get the correcr size
customer_reviews.text: i know the size difference between women and men and i bought the mens because i walk more outside and women shoes normally don't last more then 2-3 months verse the mens. but when i got the shoes i had an extra room that i don't need to have.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

product_meta.title: Asics Mens Endurant Shoes
product_meta.description: Mens ASICS Endurant; :: The ENDURANT; shoe is designed for light trail-running. A close weave mesh upper keeps your feet cool, while keeping dirt and debris out for a more comfortable off-road adventure.
feature_bullets: Synthetic Leather and Mesh Upper: Lightweight, comfortable and breathable, enhancing performance and fit.
Reinforced Stitched Toe Cap: Added durability
